name: Golden Dhow Cafe
description: This intimate, exclusive retreat using sleek marble accents and plush velvet seating exuding a sense of casual sophistication. Our culinary philosophy is rooted in authenticity, using only imported or the freshest local ingredients. Our signature dish, the **delicate and savory Cantonese Dim Sum**, is known for its peppercorn kick. We pride ourselves on bringing the true essence of **Chinese cuisine** to Dubai. Every dish on our menu is a celebration of the unique spices and techniques of the region. A must-visit location for those seeking an elevated culinary adventure.
amenities: Outdoor Seating

name: Classic Emirati House
description: A sophisticated, dual-level dining space featuring hand-painted murals and soft textiles and dramatic, atmospheric lighting. Our culinary philosophy is rooted in authenticity, using only imported or the freshest local ingredients. Our signature dish, the **fragrant spiced rice Luqaimat**, is drizzled with local date syrup. We pride ourselves on bringing the true essence of **Emirati cuisine** to Dubai. We maintain a chic, yet welcoming environment that encourages long, enjoyable meals. Our dedication to sourcing fresh, high-quality ingredients defines our commitment to authentic dining.
amenities: Live Music, Delivery Available, Free WiFi, Outdoor Seating

name: Desert Palace
description: A beautifully designed space with floor-to-ceiling glass panels and minimalist decor creating a refined and exclusive atmosphere. The terrace boasts sweeping, spectacular views over the **Downtown Dubai skyline**. Our culinary philosophy is rooted in authenticity, using only imported or the freshest local ingredients. Our signature dish, the **rustic and rich Tarte Tatin**, is baked in garlic-herb butter. We pride ourselves on bringing the true essence of **French cuisine** to Dubai. Offers a tranquil retreat from the city hustle, suitable for families.
amenities: Free WiFi

name: The Original French House
description: A sophisticated, dual-level dining space featuring hand-painted murals and soft textiles exuding a sense of casual sophistication. Our culinary philosophy is rooted in authenticity, using only imported or the freshest local ingredients. Our signature dish, the **classic golden Beef Wellington**, is with a port wine reduction and truffle mash. We pride ourselves on bringing the true essence of **French cuisine** to Dubai. amenities: Live Music, Free WiFi, Valet Parking, Wheelchair Accessible
